CNO Software development using Agile methodologies and CCPython CNO Capability and infrastructure integration on Windows and Linux targets Onsite technical support Liaison between technical customer contacts and remote engineering team Program analysis and support steering future program direction Requirements A successful candidate in this position will be both an individual contributor to the program and serve as a liaison interacting with technical support and operational users of the framework and system Individual contribution to the program includes software engineering tasks related to CNO framework development and other CODEX products including foundational tools capabilities and exploits As a customer liaison the candidate will become familiar with the programs product and be able to provide guidance to users about the operation and management of the system The candidate will further be responsible for onsite troubleshooting and identification of bugs or areas where the user experience may need improvement The candidate will need to be comfortable working with Classification Advisory Officers to review requirements bug reports and customer feedback for communication to remote team members The candidate will also identify opportunities for synergies between CODEX products and the customers infrastructure and provide feedback as to future business development activities The candidate should have experience with CNOCyber operations and development Fluency in Python Linux system administration on the command line and excellent documentation skills are required Strong communication skills are required as this role will allow the candidate to steer our teams direction with the customer through face to face support requirements analysis and interaction In addition the candidate should have some exposure to agile software development to include requirements definition code reviews product planning and retrospectives Qualified applicants subject to a US Government security background investigation and must meet minimum eligibility requirements for access to classified information US Citizenship and an active TSSCI with polygraph
